Package to.us.resume_builder.business.util

Class ImageCache

java.lang.Object
to.us.resume_builder.business.util.ImageCache
public class ImageCache
extends java.lang.Object
Flyweight factory for the SimpleImagePanel class

Example of Design Pattern: Flyweight (the flyweights themselves being the Java Image class)

Author:
Micah

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.awt.Image> images
    The cache of images, used to save memory
    private static java.lang.Object LOCK
    An Object to ensure only a single instance of ImageCache is created by using a synchronization
    private static java.util.logging.Logger LOG
    Logs when an Image is being loaded
    private static ImageCache singleton
    The only instance of an ImageCache

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Modifier Constructor Description
    private ImageCache()
    Initializes a HashMap to hold the locations of the various images to be cached

  • Method Summary

    Allows access to all cached images based on filename.

    Allows access to the singleton instance.

      public static ImageCache getInstance()

    • getImage

      public java.awt.Image getImage​(java.lang.String path)
      Allows access to all cached images based on filename.
      Parameters:
      path - The path to the image
      Returns:
      The flyweight Image

    • loadImage

      protected java.awt.Image loadImage​(java.lang.String pathAndFileName)
      Loads a local image from inside of the JAR.
      Parameters:
      pathAndFileName - Path to the image file to load.
      Returns:
      A corresponding Image instance.
